metadata.name: 24 | On The Edge
metadata.description:
Think this is just a still image? Think again! This NFT is evolving based on the time of day, time of year, and location, all without needing to refresh metadata. You'll see this piece evolve based on local sunrise and sunset times befor your very own eyes. **On The Edge** is the first piece in ***The 24 Series***, part of the groundbreaking *Transient Gallery*. 

 1000 foot drop offs on both sides, and at many points, the trail was no wider than the width of my shoulders. To make things a little more extreme, I visited this location during the mid-winter month of January. I had to wear micro spikes on my boots in order to achieve proper traction, as much of the trail was covered in ice. Iâ€™ve never been on a hike so exhilarating and potentially dangerous, yet the views were completely worth it once I reached the top. 

 [View Fullscreen](https://transientgallery.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmYSn71kU6rgbcrmHWTLzDqECGXvnsQSX6gPZhALepEJkt)
